footer.description: We bring together certified aesthetic clinics worldwide with patients. Safe, transparent, and professional service.

helpCenter.title: Help Center
helpCenter.subtitle: How can we help you?
helpCenter.description: You can reach us through the communication channels below. We will respond to you as soon as possible.

emailSupport.title: Email Support
emailSupport.description: Send an email for general questions. You will receive a response within 24 hours.

phoneSupport.title: Phone Support
phoneSupport.description: Contact us by phone for emergencies.

supportHours.title: Support Hours
supportHours.timezone: All times are shown in Turkish time (GMT+3)

liveSupport.title: Live Support
liveSupport.description: Our live support service is available for your instant questions.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: You can find answers to common questions in our FAQ section.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We are here to help you

howItWorks.question: How does Estyi work?
howItWorks.answer: Estyi connects patients' aesthetic treatment requests to certified clinics worldwide. Patients share photos and information, clinics send offers.

pricing.question: Is the service paid?
pricing.answer: No, the Estyi platform is completely free for patients. You only pay treatment costs to clinics.

dataSafety.question: Is my data safe?
dataSafety.answer: Yes, all your data is stored encrypted and is GDPR compliant. Your personal information is safely protected.

countries.question: Which countries do you serve?
countries.answer: We serve in Turkey, South Korea, Thailand, Mexico, Brazil, Germany, Poland, Czech Republic, India and Dubai.

clinicSelection.question: How is clinic selection made?
clinicSelection.answer: All our clinics are certified and accredited. You can review clinic profiles and read their reviews.

postTreatmentSupport.question: Is there post-treatment support?
postTreatmentSupport.answer: Yes, we provide continuous support before and after treatment. You can contact us for any questions.

payment.question: How is payment made?
payment.answer: Payments are made through secure payment systems. You pay based on the price agreed with the clinic.

faq.contactDescription: You can contact us for your questions. We will respond to you as soon as possible.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us
contact.description: Get in touch with us for your questions. We will respond to you as soon as possible.

aboutUs.title: About Us
aboutUs.subtitle: Shaping the future of aesthetic medicine
aboutUs.description: Estyi is an innovative platform that connects patients seeking aesthetic treatment worldwide with trusted clinics. We are shaping the future of aesthetic medicine with our approach focused on transparency, security, and quality.

transparent.title: Transparent Pricing
transparent.description: We offer clear prices without hidden costs. Know the treatment costs in advance.

global.title: Global Access
global.description: We provide access to certified clinics worldwide. Discover the best treatment options.

ai.title: AI-Powered Matching
ai.description: We match clinics with patients using artificial intelligence. Personalized recommendations.

quality.title: Quality Guarantee
quality.description: All our clinics undergo license and certificate verification. Only clinics that meet the highest quality standards are featured on our platform. The safety and satisfaction of our patients is our top priority.

cta.title: Get In Touch With Us
cta.description: You can contact us for your questions. We will respond to you as soon as possible.

safety.title: Security Guidelines
safety.subtitle: Learn about platform security
safety.description: Your security is very important to us on the Estyi platform. We implement the following security measures.

clinicVerification.title: Clinic Verification
clinicVerification.description: All our clinics undergo license and certificate verification. Only approved and trusted clinics are featured on our platform.

license.title: License Verification
license.description: All clinics' valid licenses are verified

dataEncryption.title: Data Encryption
dataEncryption.description: All your data is protected with SSL encryption. Your personal information and photos are stored securely.

secureMessaging.title: Secure Messaging
secureMessaging.description: Secure communication is provided through the platform. All messages are transmitted encrypted.

e2e.title: End-to-End Encryption
e2e.description: Your messages can only be read by you and the recipient

fileSharing.title: Secure File Sharing
fileSharing.description: Photo and document sharing is done through secure channels

suspiciousActivity.title: Suspicious Activity
suspiciousActivity.description: Report suspicious activities immediately. Our security team is at your service 24/7.

support.title: 24/7 Security Support
support.description: Our security team is always ready

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: Cookies required for the basic functions of the site. The site will not work properly without these cookies.

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: Cookies used to analyze site usage. Used to improve user experience.

language.title: Language Cookies
language.description: Cookies used to remember your preferred language. You will receive service in the same language on your next visit.

management.title: Cookie Management
management.description: You can manage or delete cookies from your browser settings. However, some site features may not work.

accept.title: Accept Cookies
accept.description: Accept all cookies to experience the full site.

reject.title: Reject Cookies
reject.description: Accept only essential cookies to use basic functions.

items.question: How does Estyi work?
items.answer: Estyi transmits patients' aesthetic treatment requests to certified clinics worldwide. Patients share photos and information, clinics send offers.

items.question: Is the service paid?
items.answer: No, the Estyi platform is completely free for patients. You only pay treatment fees to clinics.

items.question: Is my data safe?
items.answer: Yes, all your data is stored encrypted and is GDPR compliant. Your personal information is safely protected.

items.question: Which countries do you serve?
items.answer: We serve in Turkey, South Korea, Thailand, Mexico, Brazil, Germany, Poland, Czech Republic, India and Dubai.

items.question: How is clinic selection made?

items.question: Is there post-treatment support?

items.question: How is payment made?
